example.parse: (S (CONJ ف) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تعذر) (S-NOM-SBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_NOM وصول) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الطلاب)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC صباحاً)) (PP-DIR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مدارس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))))) (NP-PRP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC خوفاً)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الانزلاق))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: the arrival if student to school
